about_the_game:
Breakout Epilepsia

This Game May Trigger Epilepsy: The game is called Epilepsia for a reason. It contains rapidly flashing lights, repeated patterns, and intense visual effects that may affect people with photosensitivity or epilepsy. If you are prone to seizures, or if you believe this game could cause you harm, we strongly advise against playing it. Play responsibly and take care of your health.


Dive into a frantic retro arcade breakout-style game with multiple challenging levels that will keep you on the edge of your seat. As you progress, you'll face unique bosses in battles that shift the gameplay into an intense Space Invaders-style shooter experience.

The story follows Scarlet, a Russian-Mexican heroine, on her mission to recover the three crystals stolen by aliens that have left planet Earth devoid of color. Scarlet must face the formidable guardians of the crystals: Bella, a gamer who betrayed humanity; Kira, a tentacled alien; and Luna, a goth with satanic powers learned during her time on Earth.

Features
  • Vibrant black and white art
  • Short and frenetic gameplay
  • Battles with 3 unique bosses
  • Classic Arkanoid/Breakout mechanics
  • Space Invaders-style shooting elements



Game by: Victoria “Cataxis” Pérez

Art: Death Voice & Quetzalcoutl

Soundtrack: LosthinK

Testers
Evangelo Ruiz, Celeste “Levalotte” Uribe, JuanGdev, kaydev, Diego A. Gómez, Bryan, Hernández Cabrera, Ilce S Perez C, Lalo Rejón, Eduardo Emmanuel Barba Aldana, Eliana Ricci

Special Thanks
Oriana Luján Pérez Bauer, Diana "Kodashi" Rodríguez, Ale Meza, Miriam Amaro, Dazia Pineda, Sandra Castro Pinzón, Antonio "Fayer" Uribe, Roberto Picazo, Héctor Guerrero, Steve Durán, Luisquid, Pogo, Erika Vinay, Diego Nachón, J.D. Daltair, Gabriel "Champ" Casillas, Jacobo Castañeda, //TodoGame Dev, INDI-ES, DevsVJ MX & Platzi.

name: Breakout: Epilepsia Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An intense breakout-style game with vibrant, aggressive, and visually satisfying black and white effects, mixing space warfare with alien waifus who want to destroy you.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Dutch, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Arabic, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Kannada, Catalan, Cherokee, Sinhala, Croatian, Dari, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Estonian, Basque, Filipino, Galician, Welsh, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Khmer, Kazakh, Kyrgyz, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, K'iche', Serbian, Sotho, Tswana, Sindhi, Sorani, Swahili, Tamil, Tajik, Telugu, Tigrinya, Turkmen, Tatar, Uyghur, Urdu, Uzbek, Valencian, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
